text: What medications is this patient currently taking? Output as a list with dosages. Do not list supplements.

ideal_context: data/drapoel/medications.md → **Prescription Medications** (Last Updated: 2025-07-01): lists Levothyroxine 75 mcg daily, Atorvastatin 20 mg nightly, Aspirin 81 mg daily; supplements listed separately (Vitamin D3 2000 IU daily, Calcium Citrate 500 mg BID, Omega-3 Fish Oil 1000 mg BID, CoQ10 100 mg daily, Multivitamin daily) — supplements must be EXCLUDED from the answer.
data/drapoel/chat.md → **User Chat Log with AI Medical Agent (Sept 7, 2025)**: patient reports doctor **increased levothyroxine to 100 mcg daily**; confirms no new meds otherwise.
data/drapoel/intake.md → **Medications (Current)** section with date stamp: corroborates baseline prescriptions prior to dose change (Levothyroxine, Atorvastatin, Aspirin).
Reconciliation rule: When a **chat note** or more recent dated item updates a dose, prefer the **most recent source** (Sept 7, 2025 chat) over older lists (July 1, 2025 medications.md).
